channel.title: Ok 2 things plz help noob in distr3ss
channel.description: ok 1st i need to kno how to make my username the owner i tryed the player option=4 but every time i pull up char info there is no player option thing were i put the # and second i have an ip adress i opened port thru firewall yet still wont let me login uner my no-ip jus the 127.0.0.1 so wat do i do plz help me on these 2 things

item.title: Ok 2 things plz help noob in distr3ss
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyofadown Mikeyofadown
item.description:
@Mikeyofadown wrote:

For making yourself owner of the server:

Open your character file:

playerrights = 0

Change the ‘0’ to ‘3’

About your IP Connection issues, you can use Hamachi at first, if you have a router, you’ll need to portforward

Ikiliki has a tutorial on how to make a server.

Read full topic
item.source: Ok 2 things plz help noob in distr3ss
